item.title: The Art of the Algorithm: How AI's Gaming Strategies are Shaping the Future of Innovation
item.description: Demis Hassabis is a name you might not have heard before, but trust me, you will. This guy is the real deal when it comes to artificial intelligence (AI). He’s the mastermind behind DeepMind, a company that’s been making waves in the AI world for years now. And recently, he gave a talk that blew my mind. Now, I’ve been around the block a few times when it comes to technology.
